dcterms:creator: G. M. Weiss
dcterms:description: The WISDM smartphone and smartwatch activity and biometrics dataset includes recordings derived from sensors worn by 51 subjects instructed to perform 18 different tasks lasting 3 minutes each. The signals are acquired by capturing accelerometer and gyroscope readings with a sampling frequency of 20 Hz, and the activities are grouped into three categories: non-hand-oriented activities, hand-oriented activities related to general tasks, and hand-oriented activities tied to eating actions.
dcterms:title: WISDM Smartphone and Smartwatch Activity and Biometrics Dataset

dcterms:creator: G. M. Weiss
K. Yoneda
T. Hayajneh
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on smartphone and smartwatch-based biometrics using activities of daily living, providing insights into how biometric data can be collected and analyzed through wearable devices during everyday tasks.
dcterms:title: WISDM Smartphone and Smartwatch-Based Biometrics Using Activities of Daily Living
